doc: SSL Client Certificate fails for zip files in private repository

I have a basic private repository setup that requires a SSL Client Certificate. Composer _can_ access the packages.json file. It can determine what zip file it needs to download. However, when it tries to fetch the zip file, there is a handshake error.
Standard browsers with the client certificate can access the zip files.
wget with the client certificate can access the zip files.
I'm not sure why composer can fetch the packages.json file, but not other files.
A composer.json file that looks like this:
When I run install on it:

failed to open stream: operation failed
